todos.title: Create Directory Social Media Accounts
todos.context: Create Facebook Page and LinkedIn Company Page for 'Medicare Broker Directory'. Share access with team when ready.
todos.notes: Facebook Page created, Alex has admin access. LinkedIn Page created, Alex access pending (account too new).

todos.title: Email Deliverability DNS Setup
todos.context: Work with Owen to add SPF/DKIM/DMARC records in GoDaddy for medicarebrokerdirectory.com. Owen will provide exact records once you pick email service (Mailgun or SendGrid).

todos.title: Share Lovable.dev Credentials
todos.context: Share Lovable.dev login with Devin for Medicare Broker Directory GitHub migration.

todos.title: Register Forum Accounts (or delegate)
todos.context: Create accounts on insurance-forums.com and Reddit (u/MedicareBrokerDir) for Directory marketing.
todos.notes: Insurance Forums (MedicareBrokerDir) - pending admin approval. Reddit (MedicareBrokerDir) - active.

todos.title: Pick Email Service
todos.context: Choose between Mailgun or SendGrid for Directory outreach emails. Owen needs this to provide DNS records.
